items.title: Lectric’s Black Friday Sale offers up to $893 bundles with e-bikes starting from $999
items.summary:
The month is kicking off big for folks looking to score a commuting solution from one of America’s favorite e-bike brands. Lectric eBikes has launched its early Black Friday Sale that is seeing up to $893 in savings across the e-bike lineup, including another $500 price cut on the premium ONE commuter and up to 25% discounts on accessories. Leading the group with some of the biggest bundles are Lectric’s XPedition Cargo e-bikes, which can be broken down into three configurations: the starting 13Ah single-battery e-bike with $346 in gear at $1,399 shipped, the 26Ah dual-battery e-bike with $744 in gear at $1,799 shipped, or the 35Ah dual-battery long-range e-bike with $893 in gear at $1,999 shipped. These bundles would normally run you $1,745, $2,543, and $2,892, respectively, but now, you’re getting the largest packages we’ve tracked since this second-generation hauler hit the market one year ago.

items.title: Cross Whisker’s Litter-Robots off your shopping list with up to $152 Black Friday savings and lows from $599
items.summary:
Whisker has launched its Black Friday Sale promotions with up to $152 savings across its newest and legacy Litter-Robot bundles, as well as select price cuts on bundles that are taking rates lower than before, like the new Litter-Robot EVO Insights Bundle at $699 shipped, which gives you a lot more than the starting 3-year warranty bundle that is at the same price during this event. Not only do you get the 3-year warranty, but you’ll also get a litter-trap mat, 25 disposable waste drawer liners, and a year of the new Whisker+ membership service that provides the most advanced insights into your pets’ routines and health. This is one of the brand’s newest models that just released in late October, which we saw drop from its $851 full price to $776 in launch deals. Now, in its second-ever savings event, you’re getting an even greater $152 markdown for a new all-time low price, just in time to pick one up for your home or as a gift to a loved one. Head below to browse the full lineup of Black Friday deals we’re seeing on the brand’s newest and legacy models.

items.title: EcoFlow Black Friday flash sale offers up to 55% off DELTA Pro solar bundle, smart generator, more from $1,189
items.summary:
As part of its new wave of Black Friday savings, EcoFlow has launched the first of its Phase 3 48-hour flash sales with up to 55% savings taken off a solar generator bundle and three ways to bolster your backup power support, either for power stations or your home backup needs. That solar generator package bundles EcoFlow’s DELTA Pro Portable Power Station with a 400W solar panel and a FREE protective bag for $1,799 shipped, which matches Amazon’s pricing on the same bundle, minus the free bag (valued at $99). While it carries a $4,898 MSRP direct from the brand, the bagless package can often be found starting lower at $3,999 at Amazon, with discounts having taken costs as low as $1,799 before a former early Black Friday flash sale (also without a free bag) dropped things to $1,599 for the first time (costing you $1,698 total to add the bag there). The deal here provides you with the next-best price to date, giving you $2,200 off the going rate and $3,099 off the MSRP. Head below to check out the full lineup of flash deals lasting through November 22.
